item.title: Uncleared autumn leaves, 15th November
item.description:
Autumn leaves since uncleared since October now mulching and causing a slip hazard. Extremely dangerous, especially for the elderly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Road, Elmstead, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Leaves on steps, 15th November
item.description:
The steps of Warren Walk were already broken, uneven and sloping. They're now covered with a thick layer of wet leaves, which makes the steps hard to see and the surface slippery.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coombe Lodge, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lighting on walkway - safety risk, 15th November
item.description:
The Rotherhithe Street end of the walkway between Heron Place and Admiral Place has no street lights working at the moment. I have reported this to the managing agents but they say this is Southwark Council’s responsibility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nelson Walk, Rotherhithe, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Woodland path lamp no.41807 not working, 15th November
item.description:
For several months one of the lamps lighting the woodland path between Bywater Place bus stop and Rotherhithe St hasn’t worked. Since the darker evenings it makes a noticeable difference and leaves a section of the path very dark with poor visibility. The lamppost has a sticker on it saying it is number 41807. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nelson Walk, Rotherhithe, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bush, 15th November
item.description:
Bushes on the garden wall of 2a Farwell Road are overgrown on public footpath side to the extent that for about 10 metres of Walton Road, the available footpath is less than 1 metre wide. It needs to be cut back to the boundary wall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farwell Road, Albany Park, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waist high weeds IN THE GRASS verges, huge clumps of nettles at the edge beside the pathway, 15th November
item.description:
This is our second reporting that Invidia has failed to mow the grass here at all for weeks and weeks. The grass is a mess, and the weeds form huge clumps high enough to hide a child or dog inside. This is unacceptable and a blight on our homes and our street. We are council tax payers so this is a street service we have paid for, and should be done on a 4 weekly cycle throughout the year. As it once was under Veolia.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Amherst Drive, Poverest, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain causing the road to become flooded, 15th November
item.description:
This has been an issue for one month or so. With rains expected, the problem will only get worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Amherst Drive, Poverest, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
